titleStmt.title: An alarum to London, or, The famous London's blowing up by Londoners sounded, not to fire their buildings, but to quench their burnings : in a letter to Major Generall Browne.
titleStmt.author: Beech, William.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Beech. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
